metadata.title: CVE-2023-25193 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: hb-ot-layout-gsubgpos.hh in HarfBuzz through 6.0.0 allows attackers totrigger O(n^2) growth via consecutive marks during the process of lookingback for base glyphs when attaching marks.

criterions.comment: harfbuzz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
openjdk-8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjdk-lts: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjdk-17: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
